t: Building for the Better: Amazon's new Facility in Johnston, RI - Hinckley Allen
s: Among other such work, BPG identifies and controls sites, and permits and builds facilities for Amazon across the US. On November 19, 2021, Amazon closed on its purchase of approximately 195 acres of land in Johnston, Rhode Island, the site of its planned distribution facility.

t: Here's a look inside Amazon's new Johnston facility. Just watch out for robots.
s: July 10, 2024 - Roomba-like robots do most of the heavy pushing on floors 2-5 · JOHNSTON — On the fifth floor of the new, towering Amazon distribution facility in Johnston, supersized Roomba-like Hercules robots crisscross a mostly empty concrete floor in a giant fenced-off pen just for them.
